title: Pregnant Shawn Johnson squeezes into Olympics leotard at 40 weeks, reveals who baby looks like
text:
CLOSE

Shawn Johnson and Andrew East are awaiting the birth of their first child, due any day now. (Photo: Joe Scarnici/Getty Images for 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment)

At 40 weeks, Olympian Shawn Johnson and husband Andrew East are entertaining themselves as they await their baby's arrival.

This weekend, the Olympic gymnastic gold medalist donned her competition leotard on her husband's dare and showed the world that, yes, it still fits. The couple also shared a video on Sunday inviting the public to see what their child will look like as an adult, with hilarious results.

The two are expecting their first child any day now after experiencing a miscarriage two years ago.

In the Instagram leotard post, Johnson, 27, rests one hand on her baby bump, a look of pure satisfaction on her face. She wrote: "@andrewdeast dared me to hahah 40 weeks preggers."

Prayers have been answered: Shawn Johnson, Andrew East reveal genetic test results after pregnancy complications

One of the most vulnerable videos: Shawn Johnson and Andrew East reveal pregnancy complications in emotional video

Johnson added, "But no joke ... this babes is already more rewarding than any medal was. BABY! GET HERE ALREADY!"

An East baby reveal ... sort of

In the couple's latest video from the YouTube series The East Family, they invited a caricature artist to draw what their baby will look like. The cartoonist exaggerated features from both Johnson and Eastman.

"He overlaid the two and gave us a pretty cool result," Eastman said.

"And this is the interesting part," Johnson added. "Andrew had them draw a girl and a boy, potentially at our current age."

The couple is waiting until the baby's birth to learn its gender.

East told the artist to give the boy a Brad Pitt haircut in the sketch. Upon seeing the blond-haired, green-eyed offspring with Johnson's ears, eyes, cheekbones, East said, "I'm proud of my boy!"

The girl child had dark hair, dark eyes and a hard expression on her face.

"I'm out," Johnson said upon seeing her. "I don't want to deal with her. She's a lot."

East agreed. "I know. It freaked me out," he said. "It got real."

The couple announced in a previous video that the baby's due date was Oct. 23.

Follow the latest from USA TODAY Parenting at usatoday.com/life/parenting.

Read or Share this story: https://www.usatoday.com/story/life/parenting/2019/10/27/shawn-johnson-andrew-eastman-invite-fans-see-baby-adult/2479124001/
description: Shawn Johnson, who is expecting a baby any day now, squeezed into her Olympic leotard. The couple invited fans to "see" what the child will look like.
